name: Radu Dobrin
content: IDT - ES MDH | IDT | ES | IPR | Admin HomePeoplePublicationsOrganizationProjectsOpen PositionsAbout ESContactNewsEvents MDH Home IDT Home IDT Education Radu Dobrin, Associate Professor, Head of Division, International Coordinator E-mail: radu.dobrin@mdh.se Room: U2-071 Phone: 021-107356 Division: Division of Computer Science and Software Engineering Research group: Dependable Software Engineering BiographyResearchPublicationsProjectsPhD studentsMSc thesesRadu Dobrin is Vice-Dean at the School of Innovation, Design and Engineering at Mälardalen University and the Head of the Computer Science and Software Engineering Division (CSE). He has a background in scheduling of dependable real-time systems and is currently involved in both research and education-oriented projects. Currently, his research is focused in the area of dependable embedded real-time systems build using component based development.
